terraform.tfvars.example
files.content:
aws_region = "us-east-1"
name       = "epicac"

# REQUIRED: set to the image you push to ECR (see build.sh in repo)
# Example:
# container_image = "123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/epicac:sha-abcdef"
container_image = "REPLACE_ME"

# OPTIONAL: role(s) to assume (cross-account role chaining)
# assume_role_arns = [
#   "arn:aws:iam::111111111111:role/target-role",
# ]
assume_role_arns = []
